title: Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono President of Indonesia

quotes: President of Indonesia (2004-2014)
a period between 2004 and 2014 that was marked by democratic development, political stability, high economic growth and resilience, conflict resolution and robust international role.
the conflict in Aceh was peacefully and permanently resolved in mid-2005
As per November 2015, he has 8.2 million followers on Twitter, and 5 million on Facebook.
